comment: ` ( ( B `` N ) - ( B `` ( N + 1 ) ) ) ` is expressed as a limit of a series. This result will be used both to prove that ` B ` is decreasing and to prove that ` B ` is bounded (below). It will follow that ` B ` converges in the reals. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 29-Jun-2017.)
